page.html:
tinacms-condition-field

To try out, open the sidebar and toggle the highlight setting. All unneccessary fields will be hidden and that's exactly what this field does. It toggles fields based on a condition. Also checkout the global form for the navigation, it works also with json!
page.rawMarkdownBody:
# tinacms-condition-field

To try out, open the sidebar and toggle the _highlight_ setting. All unneccessary fields will be hidden and that's exactly what this field does. It toggles fields based on a condition. Also checkout the global form for the navigation, it works also with json!
